definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions, would be the scurf of yesterday's.
sentences.chinese: 没有你，今日的心情就只是昨日的头皮屑。

sentences.english: This shampoo will cure your dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 这种洗发液可以防治头皮屑。

sentences.english: These active ingredients are beneficial for treating flaky scalps and dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 这些活性成分有助于减少头皮碎屑和头皮屑的发生。

sentences.english: This makes me so sore it gets my dandruff up.
sentences.chinese: 我气得连头皮屑都竖起来了。

sentences.english: You hair has a lot of dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 你头发里有很多头皮屑。

sentences.english: Some hair tonic is good for the scalp and it prevents dandruff.
sentences.chinese: 来点护发素对头皮有益，可以防止生头皮屑。
我正在用一种去头皮屑的洗发液。

sentences.english: Every winter he has a problem with dandruff in his hair.
sentences.chinese: 每年冬天头皮屑都困扰着他。

sentences.english: Philip's 48 and has a flaky scalp problem.
sentences.chinese: 菲利普巳经48岁，而且受头皮屑的困扰。

sentences.english: Without you, today's emotions would be the scurf of yesterday's.
sentences.chinese: 要是没有你，今天的心情只是昨天的头皮屑。

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
baldness/to lose hair or feathers/to molt/depilation
